segments.text: I see the puddle growing wider, threatening to soak everything it touches.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman continues drying her dish, blissfully ignorant of the flood at her feet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s a strange contrast, the chaos inside and the tranquility outside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: What would happen if she slipped and fell?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t help but feel a bit disgusted by how oblivious she is.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children’s secretive operation feels like a mischievous game, but it’s so dangerous!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I want to shout out a warning, but I just stand here watching.
segments.speaker: PAR
